name: Hacking Harry
description:
Here is my GMKT Game Jam 2020 game,

This is my first Game Jam and thought it went well with being a one man team.

Game is about a robot called Harry who keeps getting hack and has to open his hacking terminal and regain control.

Controls 

A - W - D = Movement Controls 

Q = Open Hacking Terminal 

TAB = Open Pause Menu

Num Pad 0-9 = Hack Commands

Leave any feedback you have in the comments below.
